detaileddescription.para: Not the first HMM for words, which multiplex HMMs based on different left contexts. This structure is used both in the dynamic HMM tree structure and in the per-word last-phone right context fanout.

briefdescription.para: Lexical tree node data type for the first phone (root) of each dynamic HMM tree structure.

detaileddescription.para: Each state may have a different parent static HMM. Most fields are similar to those in chan_t.

briefdescription.para: Back pointer table (forward pass lattice; actually a tree)

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *name, ngram_model_t *lm, cmd_ln_t *config, acmod_t *acmod, dict_t *dict, dict2pid_t *d2p)
memberdef.name: ngram_search_init

briefdescription.para: Record the current frame's index in the backpointer table.

memberdef.argsstring: (ngram_search_t *ngs, int frame_idx, int32 w, int32 score, int32 path, int32 rc)
memberdef.name: ngram_search_save_bp

briefdescription.para: Enter a word in the backpointer table.
Allocate last phone channels for all possible right contexts for word w.
Allocate last phone channels for all possible right contexts for word w.
Find the best word exit for the current frame in the backpointer table.

simplesect.para: the backpointer index of the best word exit.

briefdescription.para: Backtrace from a given backpointer index to obtain a word hypothesis.

simplesect.para: a read-only string with the best hypothesis.

briefdescription.para: Compute language and acoustic scores for backpointer table entries.
Construct a word lattice from the current hypothesis.
Get the exit score for a backpointer entry with a given right context.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the language model to use if nothing was passed in configuration
